mapper.insert: insert into log (created_at, content, is_deleted, project_id, modified_at, log_code, url) values (#{logDto.createdAt}, #{logDto.content}, #{logDto.isDeleted}, #{logDto.projectId}, #{logDto.modifiedAt}, #{logDto.logCode}, #{logDto.url})
